verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become as sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.

2 "JESUS_END"And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing.
3 "JESUS_END"And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.
4 "JESUS_END"Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-5/" title="1 Corinthians 13:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-6/" title="1 Corinthians 13:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-7/" title="1 Corinthians 13:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
8 "JESUS_END"Charity never faileth: but whether there be prophecies, they shall fail; whether there be tongues, they shall cease; whether there be knowledge, it shall vanish away.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-9/" title="1 Corinthians 13:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-10/" title="1 Corinthians 13:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-11/" title="1 Corinthians 13:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-12/" title="1 Corinthians 13:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
13 "JESUS_END"And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
